identity.description:
Retrieve information about PyScreener, a Python toolkit for high-throughput virtual screening.

Get comprehensive information about PyScreener - high-throughput virtual screening in Python

info_type.description: Type of information to retrieve about PyScreener

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(

  (2): Normalize()
)
